The only high school in the state of Indiana!

div.span: Cascade High School is a 2018 National Blue Ribbon School for Exemplary Performance. The only High School is the state of Indiana!

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: At Mill Creek, each of our students is more than a number, and certainly more than a test score. Although we are trained to use standardized test scores as benchmarks, I challenge each of you to become engaged in our schools to see first-hand the amazing work happening each and every day. We measure our success in this district individually, student by student. It will always be “Students First” here, and we make decisions to best serve the needs of ALL of them. We Expect Excellence in Achievement, Attitudes, and Actions by all of our stakeholders.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: If you are not sure how to get involved, please contact the PTO in each school, or your students’ principal to see how your volunteer efforts could make a difference for our schools.

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: Please take the time to "test drive" our website and learn more about MCCSC. If you would like to learn more about good things happening on a regular basis, I invite you to follow me on Twitter. (@MillCreekSupt)

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
